name: Italian Salsa Verde
description: Italian salsa verde is kind of like chimichurri taken to the next level—it's base of parsley, oil, and garlic is familiar, but a hefty dose of capers injects a sharp briney bite.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups packed, roughly chopped flat leaf parsley
1/2 teaspoon freshly grated zest from 1 lemon
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Place parsley, olive oil, capers, anchovies, vinegar, lemon juice, garlic, and lemon zest in work bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade. Pulse until parsley is well chopped, about 10 1-second pulses, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as necessary.
Season sauce with salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a small bowl and use immediately.
